about_the_game:
VR Mini Bowling 2 out now!


Welcome to the world of Mini Bowling! In this VR game bowling meets mini golf to create a totally new experience!

Key Features:

  • 3 scoring modes
  • 3 courses with 10 unique lanes each
  • Traditional bowling lane with realistic physics (spin, oil patterns)!
  • 24 different bowling balls to choose from (16 unlockable)
  • Personal best statistics for each lane and scoring mode
  • Customizable Sound Effects
  • Customizable Pin Colors
  • Customizable Light Colors
  • Anti-Gravity Pins
  • Throw Force Multiplier

Global Leaderboards:

  • Leaderboards for all individual lanes
  • Leaderboards for best overall scores in each mode
  • Leaderboard for traditional bowling mode

Multiplayer:

1-4 Player local multiplayer

Standard Mode:

In this game mode, normal bowling rules apply. Try to get the highest score possible!

Stroke Play Mode:

This mode will put your skills to the test! The goal is to knock down all of the pins in as few throws as possible.

Rush Play Mode:

Speed is the key in this mode. Knock down all of the pins as quickly as possible! You get unlimited throws in this mode so fire away!

Traditional Mode:

Feel like changing it up and playing a regular game of bowling? Now you can! You can put spin on the ball to curve it down the lane, or even change the oil pattern on the lane!

Customizations:

Customize your experience! Change sound effects, room lighting, and pin colors! Play with anti-gravity pins, or apply a force multiplier to your throws for some extra oomph! (this is not always an advantage though......)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift Headset and Controllers Required
